actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act respecting the standard for the regulation of food additives found to induce cancer.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to deem a food additive unsafe if it induces cancer when ingested by man or animal in quantities pathologically significant to man.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act respecting the standard for the regulation of food additives found to induce cancer.
